QAPair.Question: What is (are) Selective mutism - resources ?
QAPair.Answer: The following organizations are good resources for information on selective mutism : American Speech-Language-Hearing Association -- www.asha.org/public/speech/disorders/selective-mutism/ , Child Mind Institute -- childmind.org/guide/parents-guide-how-to-help-a-child-with-selective-mutism/ , Selective Mutism Association -- www.selectivemutism.org/ ,
